a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia ARAD-ka {1}DINGIR-ia-da-aʾ lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia₂ DI-mu a-na ma-a-te u₃ {URU}HAL.ṢU-MEŠ ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia ŠA₃-bi ša LUGAL be-li₂-ia lu DUG₃.GA ṭe₃-mi ša DUMU-{1}ia-GIN ina KA₂.DINGIR.RA{KI} šu-u₂ {1}ra-ad-ma-nu {LU₂}na-sik-ku ša {URU}u₂-pi-i is-sap-ra ma-a x x x {URU}sip-par-a.a iq-ṭi-bu-ni ma-a LUGAL x x x x-ni lil-li-ka x x u₂-sa-ri-u₂ x x x x na lik x x x+x a-na-ku x x x aš₂-mu-u-ni x x x+x e-mur mi-nu ša ši-ti-ni ṭe₃-mu har-ṣu a-na LUGAL be-li₂-ia a-šap-pa-ra
